org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt
Class PruningFairSetsOptions

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
          java.util.Properties
              org.svvrl.goal.core.Properties
                  org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt.PruningFairSetsOptions
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
public class PruningFairSetsOptions
extends Properties

This class provides options for pruning fair sets based on [Somenzi and Bloom. Efficient Büchi Automata From LTL Formulae].

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
Serialized Form
